1.caption: 2001 NBA All-Star Game
1.description: The 2001 NBA All-Star Game was an exhibition basketball game which was played on February 11, 2001 at the MCI Center in Washington, D.C., home of the Washington Wizards. This game was the 50th edition of the North American National Basketball Association (NBA) All-Star Game and was played during the 2000–01 NBA season.
1.inspected:Halftime show: Harry Connick, Jr. saluting 50 years of All-Star Game MVPs
1.inspected:Referees: Dan Crawford  Don Vaden  Eddie Rush

6.caption: Rising Stars Challenge
6.description: The Rising Stars Challenge featured the best first-year players ('Rookies') against the best second-year players ('Sophomores'). Kevin Loughery and Elvin Hayes served as head coaches for the rookies and sophomores respectively.
